subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: To finally win with ease, the Nets only needed to play physical defense, make their free throws and, most of all, play a team in as excruciating disarray as the Boston Celtics.
snippet: To finally win with ease, the Nets only needed to play physical defense, make their free throws and, most of all, play a team in as excruciating disarray as the Boston Celtics.
